summary:
Remember that video on Youtube? you know the one where some guy yells at his cat?,
No? then go to this link to watch it so you will get where this mod is coming from

descriptionHtml:
Remember that video on Youtube? you know the one where some guy yells at his cat?,
No? then go to this link to watch it so you will get where this mod is coming from 

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hddCpJ8MfVo

If yes continue reading on...



What does this mod do?
____________________________
This mod adds sounds from man yells at cat to the dragons in Skyrim
---
How do i install this mod?
____________________________
Extract all files into the "Data" folder where your game directory is located
---
Is this mod lore-friendly?
____________________________
Hell no


Video of the mod in game: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6-fDHz_9pzs

Have any questions, suggestions or having problems getting the mod to work? Please message me about it
author: Cylink
